properties.media:imagetext:
CANCELLATIONS AND REFUNDS: Passengers may obtain
refund of unused fare for cancelled passage, less all expense occa-
sioned in effecting reservation and cancellation thereof, provided that:
1. The proper unlifted Coupons for such cancelled passage are
surrendered to one of the Carriers at the time passage is can-
celled.
2. Notice of cancellation is given to the proper representative of
one of the Carriers on the route not later than 24 hours im-
mediately prior to the scheduled commencement of such
passage.
If such cancellation is received within the 24-hour period, a de-
duction from refund will be made at an amount equal to ten per-
cent (10%) of the unused fare for such passage. If cancellation
notice is received, or if the passenger arrives at the airport after
commencement of passage reserved, a deduction from refund will
be made at an amount equal to twenty-five percent (25 %) of such
unused fare.
Refunds will be made only by authorized accounting offices of
the Carriers from which tickets have been purchased, except that
ticket agents are authorized to redeem entirely unused tickets if
cancellation is received prior to the above mentioned time limits
before departure and provided redemption is requested from the
office which has issued the tickets. Refunds will be based upon the
difference between the publishd tariff fare for the passage com-
pleted and the fare paid.
CLAIMS: No claim will be considered unless made in writing
to an office of the Carrier on whose lines the claim arises and within
ten days after loss or damage occurs.
LIABILITY-TICKETS AND BAGGAGE CHECKS: The
terms and conditions appearing on tickets and baggage checks of
the Carriers refer and apply to carriage of passengers and property
only on the Carrier indicated on the ticket or check.
AIR EXPRESS SHIPMENTS: Corollary to other services of
the two companies, air express or package freight will be carried in
the New York/Bermuda Services. Shippers should call the Railway
Express Agency, Inc., Air Express Division, or Pan American Air-
ways in the United States, or Imperial Airways (Bermuda) Ltd. in
Bermuda.
FOR RESERVATIONS AND INFORMATION CALL
YOUR NEAREST TRAVEL AGENT, OTHER TRANSPORTATION LINES
OR
IMPERIAL AIRWAYS (BERMUDA) LTD.
PAN AMERICAN AIRWAYS SYSTEM
Darrell's Island, Bermuda
135 East 42nd Street, New York, N. Y.
BOSTON
CHICAGO
MIAMI
SEATTLE
BROWNSVILLE LOS ANGELES
SAN FRANCISCO
WASHINGTON
AIR LINES TICKET AGENCY
OF E. K. SMITH, INC.
41 EAST 47TH STREET
NEW YORK, N. Y.
Issued June 1, 1937
Printed in U.S. A.
